title: Lovely 1 bedroom 1 bath apt. in Pasadena!
posting_body: Orlando | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
Don’t miss out on this great opportunity to live in a beautiful 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment with fresh carpet flooring throughout.
Living room features a large front window to let in natural lighting.
Kitchen features a small breakfast nook with plenty of cabinets and included a stove.
Located only minutes away from Pasadena City College, Caltech, The Art Center College of design, and The Le Cordon bleu.
Call us today & schedule an appointment to view your next home!
Pets Policy: Small pets under 25 lbs.
with additional deposit and pet rent!
Please call now for more information and to schedule your personal tour!
Orlando | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
